Tasty food, good service but VERY expensive for what it was. I'd give 3.5 stars if I could.  For 4 people, our total was €221 not including tip.  We ate and drank well but based on our many other dining experiences in Spain, we could've done it for significantly less and eaten just as well.  If you are not on a budget, I would definitely recommend this spot for local experience with traditional Catalan cuisine.  Otherwise, perhaps go for lunch time based on the other review, or seek out a more affordable option.
